p:
By applying ESI-Q-ToF MS to sample 2 various sugar-mono-esters were identified. The synthesis of glucose palmitate (M GP = 418.29 Da) was verified through the occurrence of ions at m/ z 441.27 (M GP + Na +), m/ z 436.30 (M GP +
NH
4
+
), m/ z 401.26 (M GP-H 2O + H +) and m/ z 383.23 (M GP-2H 2O + H +). The same adducts of glucose oleate (M GO = 444.31 Da) were detected at m/ z 467.27, 462.32, 427.26 and 409.27. Further, glucose stearate (M GS = 446.32 Da) and glucose linoleate (M GL = 442.29 Da) was detected through the ions M GS-H 2O + H + ( m/ z 429.29) respective M GL-H 2O + H + ( m/ z 425.25). Thus, it was possible to detect sugar esters of the most common FAMEs.
